The Patriot Act is necessary, for example, because parts of the FBI couldnt talk to each other. Our law enforcement must have every tool necessary to find and disrupt terrorists at home and abroad before they hurt us again. Thats the task of the 21st century. And so, I dont think the Patriot Act abridges your rights at all. And I know its necessary. I can remember being in upstate New York talking to FBI agents that helped bust a Lackawanna cell up there.
